text: Madeleine Mich√®le Ngono Mani Epse Ongueme (born 16 October 1983), known as Madeleine Ngono Mani, is a Cameroonian football striker currently playing for Albi Croix in the French second tier. She is a member of the Cameroonian national team, with which she has played the 2012 Summer Olympics, the African Women's Championship, and the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==References== Category:Cameroonian footballers Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Madeleine Ngono Mani
